generateTokenURI(address,uint256,uint96).details: Generates a token URI for an Polkadot Builders Crest NFT based on a provided DNA.

returns._0: The generated token URI as a string.

getImageParts(address,uint96).details: Loads the parts to display in the SVG, for a given DNA

returns._0: The the parts to display in the SVG.

userdoc.notice: Library to generate token URIs for Polkadot Builder Crests NFTs.
